name: Everything is on fire, and it's entirely your fault
name_original: Everything is on fire, and it's entirely your fault
description:
A puzzle game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 with the theme of "Let there be chaos".

This game also happens to be the first game I have made.

Controls: WASD/Arrow Keys to move the player in the 4 cardinal directions on to adjacent tiles.

The player is this purple fire blob.

Your goal is to set EVERYTHING on fire.

There are different tiles that the player can interact with

This blue brick is a water tile.


The player cannot move into or through water tiles.

This green wavy thing is a wind tile.


Standing on the wind tile lets the player jump over any adjacent tiles, such as the water tile from above, landing 2 tiles away.

This red excitable object is a blast tile.

Standing on a blast tile lets the player shoot themselves in the pressed direction. Woosh!

Every other move you make, your warm purple virtual burning avatar will set fire to its previous tile, leaving behind a cozy cuddly orange friend.

This fire will spread every other move as well, and the player cannot move into or through it either.

Plan your movement carefully, lest you be blocked by your own toasty orange firelings.

It is however, considerate to at the very least, not spread on to your current tile of residence.

Your goal, once again, is to set EVERYTHING on fire. Every. Single. Tile.

Every level has at least one solution.

Built in Unity.

Using the following assets from the unity store:
Free Pixel Font - Thaleah

Absolutely Free Music

Hand Painted Seamless Wood Texture Vol - 6
